What documentation or repo-level change is this?
Updates ...

## Scope

- [ ] README / Markdown
- [ ] Org-level policy

Why this change is needed.

## Checklist

- [ ] Spelling and links checked
- [ ] No sensitive or internal data exposed
- [ ] Matches Lupaxa tone and footer
- [ ] Commits are GPG/SSH signed
